roleset.name: to specify the genetic code for

example.text: Expression of the ompF and ompC genes, which encode the major outer membrane proteins, OmpF and OmpC, respectively, is affected in a reciprocal manner by the osmolarity of the growth medium.
example.arg: Expression of the ompF and ompC genes
the major outer membrane proteins, OmpF and OmpC

example.text: MAZ may encode a transcription factor with dual roles in transcription initiation and termination.
example.arg: a transcription factor with dual roles in transcription initiation and termination

example.text: The Escherichia coli yjhA (renamed nanC) gene encodes a protein of the KdgM family of outer membrane-specific channels.
example.arg: The Escherichia coli yjhA (renamed nanC) gene
a protein of the KdgM family of outer membrane-specific channels

example.text: The gene yjfQ encodes the repressor of the yjfR-X regulon (ula), which is involved in L-ascorbate metabolism in Escherichia coli.
example.arg: the repressor of the yjfR-X regulon (ula)

example.text: The glp regulon of Escherichia coli encodes the proteins required for utilization of sn-glycerol 3-phosphate and its precursors.
example.arg: The glp regulon of Escherichia coli
the proteins required for utilization of sn-glycerol 3-phosphate and its precursors

example.text: We recently encloned murine and human cDNAs that encode CP2, a cellular transcription factor that interacts with the alpha-globin promoter as well as with additional cellular and viral promoter elements.
